casebody.data:
Kelvin W. SELLARS
v.
Frank L. PERRY. No. 415P13-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 14, 2015. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Kelvin W. Sellars, for Sellars, Kelvin W.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 8th of July 2015 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Chatham County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of July 2015."
